widget.group_definition.description: The definition for a Group widget.

widget.group_definition.layout_type.description: The layout type of the group, only 'ordered' for now.

widget.group_definition.widget.description: The list of widgets in this group.

widget.group_definition.widget.change_de.description: The definition for a Change  widget.
Nested block describing a custom link. Multiple `custom_link` blocks are allowed with the structure below.
The label for the custom link URL.
The URL of the custom link.
The timeframe to use when displaying the widget. One of `10m`, `30m`, `1h`, `4h`, `1d`, `2d`, `1w`, `1mo`, `3mo`, `6mo`, `1y`, `alert`.

Nested block describing the request to use when displaying the widget. Multiple request blocks are allowed with the structure below (exactly one of `q`, `apm_query`, `log_query`, `rum_query`, `security_query` or `process_query` is required within the request block).
The aggregator to use for time aggregation. One of `avg`, `min`, `max`, `sum`, `last`.
The alias for the column name. Default is the metric name.
Nested block describing the timeframe to use when displaying the widget. The structure of this block is described below. **Deprecated.** Define `live_span` directly in the widget definition instead.
The alignment of the widget's title. One of `left`, `center`, or `right`.
The size of the widget's title. Default is 16.
